title: Goddess Bastet as a Cat on a Lotus Column
description:
Hollow bronze lotus column surmounted by large figure of a cat cast solid, flanked by two kittens. Details incised. 
Probably intended as a votive offering. 
Condition: About one-half of lower edge of column missing. Small hole in capital.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
